SpikeCV‚ö°Ô∏è

I'm leading SpikeCV, an open-source project designed for the emerging field of spike camera vision. It brings together spiking datasets, reusable algorithms, and hardware interfaces ‚Äî everything you need to explore fast, brain-inspired vision. The goal is to build a community around spike-based computing and help researchers get from simulation to real-world deployment.

We are actively growing the SpikeCV community, aiming to bring together researchers, engineers, and enthusiasts working on spike-based vision systems. We‚Äôd love to have you on board if you‚Äôre interested ‚Äî feel free to reach out and join us! ‚ú®

Heartfelt thanks to my amazing collaborators: Jiyuan, Rui, Jianhao, Shiyan, Weijian
& Prof. Tiejun Huang. üíõ
